sentences.en: Centrifugal and centripetal forces are very important in physics.
sentences.cn: 离心力和向心力在物理学里很重要.

sentences.en: Centripetal force is the force needed to overcome inertia so that the car makes the corner.
sentences.cn: 向心力是用来克服惯性所需的力,这样汽车就能顺利转弯.

sentences.en: Do not confuse ever the tangential acceleration, which is along the circumference, with a centripetal acceleration.
sentences.cn: 但是别把这个切向加速度，它是沿着圆周的，和向心加速度混淆。

sentences.en: Does centripetal force or the force of gravity bring orbiting bodies to the earth's surface?
sentences.cn: 是否向心力或重力使轨道机构对地球表面的?

sentences.en: It is called the centripetal acceleration.

sentences.en: The centripetal and centrifugal forces acting in opposition to each other keep our planet in her orbit.
sentences.cn: 向心力和离心力互相对峙的缘故，遂能使行星在轨道上行动。

sentences.en: The comparison shows the centripetal tendency of the complements.
sentences.cn: 比较之后,可以看出补语演变过程中的向心趋势.

sentences.en: The expectancy effect has characteristics of suggestibility , level, centripetal and emotion.

sentences.en: This paper puts forward centripetal suspension design idea in allusion to defect of the general double axle suspension of semi trailer.
sentences.cn: 针对半挂车普通双桥悬架的缺陷，提出了向心悬架的设计思想。
